languages.text: {n}В массе рабочих слуги Домин почти не отличаются от обычных серфов... для мирян. В мире, где статус и привилегии определяются внешним видом, кусок гнилой ткани может низвергнуть тебя. Мы станем призрачными гончими и пойдем по следу, не привлекая внимания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Возжелали пойти со мной, но презрели совет и надели привычные одежды. Что ж. Подобно мне им в тенях не укрыться, но я могу использовать их приметность. Пусть станут угрозой, нависшей над палатами плазмадвигателя. Пусть будоражат души мирян, в чьих сердцах прорастет страх неминуемой кары.{/n}

languages.text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В массе рабочих слуги Домин почти не отличаются от обычных серфов... для мирян. В мире, где статус и привилегии определяются внешним видом, кусок гнилой ткани может низвергнуть тебя. Мы станем призрачными гончими и пойдем по следу, не привлекая внимания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}To laypeople, the servants of Enim are scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a piece of rotten cloth can bring you down. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

{n}To laypeople, the servants of Enim are scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a piece of rotten cloth can bring you down. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

{n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

{n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Für die Laien sind die zwei kaum von den gewöhnlichen Sklaven zu unterscheiden. In einer Welt, in der Status und Privileg durch das Aussehen definiert werden, reicht ein einziges Stück fauligen Stoffes aus, um den Stand zu verringern. Wir werden zu geisterhaften Jagdhunden und folgen den Spuren, ohne Aufmerksamkeit zu wecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Für die Laien sind die zwei kaum von den gewöhnlichen Sklaven zu unterscheiden. In einer Welt, in der Status und Privileg durch das Aussehen definiert werden, reicht ein einziges Stück fauligen Stoffes aus, um den Stand zu verringern. Wir werden zu geisterhaften Jagdhunden und folgen den Spuren, ohne Aufmerksamkeit zu wecken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Para los laicos, ambos son prácticamente imposibles de distinguir de siervos comunes. En un mundo en el que la apariencia define el estatus y los privilegios, una sola pieza de tela desgarrada basta para reducir tu categoría. Nos convertiremos en sabuesos espectrales para seguir el rastro sin llamar la atención.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Para los laicos, ambos son prácticamente imposibles de distinguir de siervos comunes. En un mundo en el que la apariencia define el estatus y los privilegios, una sola pieza de tela desgarrada basta para reducir tu categoría. Nos convertiremos en sabuesos espectrales para seguir el rastro sin llamar la atención.{/n}

languages.text: {n}素人には、この二人は今や一般的な農奴とほぼ区別がつかなくなっている。地位や特権が外見で決まる世界では、腐った布一枚あれば地位を下げることができる。我らは呪われし猟犬となり、人々の注目を集めることなく後を追う。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}素人には、この二人は今や一般的な農奴とほぼ区別がつかなくなっている。地位や特権が外見で決まる世界では、腐った布一枚あれば地位を下げることができる。我らは呪われし猟犬となり、人々の注目を集めることなく後を追う。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在普通船员眼中，这两个人如今与底层船员毫无二致。在这个世界里，你的外表决定了你的地位与特权，而只要一块破布，就足以拉低你的地位。我们将会成为隐形的猎犬，在不引起任何人注意的情况下追踪敌人的踪迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在普通船员眼中，这两个人如今与底层船员毫无二致。在这个世界里，你的外表决定了你的地位与特权，而只要一块破布，就足以拉低你的地位。我们将会成为隐形的猎犬，在不引起任何人注意的情况下追踪敌人的踪迹。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pour les profanes, ces deux-là ont tout des serfs ordinaires. Dans un monde où l'apparence détermine le statut et le privilège, un simple morceau de tissu déchiré suffit à vous faire descendre d'une marche sur l'échelle sociale. Nous prendrons donc soin de nous faire discrets et suivrons la piste sans attirer l'attention, tels des chiens spectraux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pour les profanes, ces deux-là ont tout des serfs ordinaires. Dans un monde où l'apparence détermine le statut et le privilège, un simple morceau de tissu déchiré suffit à vous faire descendre d'une marche sur l'échelle sociale. Nous prendrons donc soin de nous faire discrets et suivrons la piste sans attirer l'attention, tels des chiens spectraux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Avam tabakasının gözünde bu ikisinin sıradan kölelerden artık pek ayırt edilir yanı yok. Statüyle ayrıcalığın görünümle belirlendiği bir dünyada perişan olmuş tek bir kıyafet parçası bile itibarını düşürmeye yeter. Ruhani tazılara dönüşerek dikkat çekmeden izi takip edeceğiz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To the laypeople, the two are now scarcely distinguishable from the common serfs. In a world where status and privilege are defined by appearance, a single piece of rotten cloth is enough to lower your standing. We will become spectral hounds and follow the trail without drawing attention.{/n}
